about_the_game:
Stay with Me! Alien Abduction Story is a psychological horror narrative game. Experience firsthand the damage fear can do to your mind by getting lost alone in a series of unexplained events. As a player we will control who will be involved in a series of events for normals from another world



This is the story of Ana, whose whereabouts have not been known since November 1999, who has also filmed her last hours before disappearing, as a player we will try to find out what happened to her, a game with a gloomy setting, where sound plays a role important in the adventure, full of mysteries and strange creatures (apparently not from this world) will haunt us throughout the story.

Can you find out what happened to Ana?



The game is inspired by iconic movies from the 80s and 90s, as well as popular alien encounter stories.

Its artistic section evokes the style of a home movie, immersing the player in a mystery that they must unravel. The gameplay, without any external help, reflects real life and the decisions made during the adventure will determine the various possible outcomes and endings.



  • Visual style reminiscent of home movies shot on VHS
  • First person and Third person view
  • You can select whether to play in 16:9 / Ultra Wide or 4:3 for a more realistic experience
  • This game is packed with endings, each of which will give you a unique experience every time you play it. Each start of the game will take you to different situations, and will surprise you with new outcomes each time.

content_descriptors.notes:
Strong lighting effects
Subjective violence
Moderate physical violence
Abduction

This is the story of Ana, whose whereabouts have not been known since November 1999, who has also filmed her last hours before disappearing, as a player we will try to find out what happened to her, a game with a gloomy setting, where sound plays a role important in the adventure, full of mysteries and strange creatures (apparently not from this world) will haunt us throughout the story.

Can you find out what happened to Ana?



The game is inspired by iconic movies from the 80s and 90s, as well as popular alien encounter stories.

Its artistic section evokes the style of a home movie, immersing the player in a mystery that they must unravel. The gameplay, without any external help, reflects real life and the decisions made during the adventure will determine the various possible outcomes and endings.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2.50GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2.50GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Processor: Apple Apple M1 1st Gen Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Neural Engine
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: Stay with Me! Alien Abduction Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/30FP
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS.

short_description: In 1999, a young woman disappears in a nearby forest. Her whereabouts remain unknown to this day. The only trace of her is a VHS recording. Relive the last hours of her in an adventure of psychological terror, the decisions we make can have different results
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
